name: Fighting Cube 01
effect: Attach this card to 1 of your {F} Pokémon in play. That Pokémon my use this card’s attack instead of its own. At the end of your turn, discard Fighting Cube 01.
author: “Big Mama” Tagawa

attacks.name: Violent Rage
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of damage counters on this Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
